page.title: 06DUNVANT MALE CHOIR
page.content: The exact date of the formation of the choir is unknown but it was during the last quarter of the last century and was formed,in the first place,from the male section of Ebenezer Chapel Choral Society.It has flourished ever since and to-day has in the region of one hundred members.Practices were held weekly in the Vestry of Ebenezer Chapel until 1972 when the growing number of members necessitated the seeking of larger premises.Practices are now held in Gowerton Comprehensive School,a mile or so away. Apart from being very successful in eisteddfodau (choral competitions),the choir has given numerous concerts, locally and nationally, in aid of charities.In recent years the choir has built up an international reputation as a result of tours in countries such as Germany and Canada.
